title: Looking for lvling Partner.
body:
>+-+-OCE-+-+

Looking for a duo to lvl up with me, Am currently lvl 19. Looking for a chill person that wants to win but isn't overly serious or toxic, Must also have a decent idea of how to play as am trying for fast wins to lvl asap.

I will play any role.
WW/Kindread - JG
Sion/Anivia - Supp
Sion/ww/Anivia - top
lucian/ MF - ADC

Having a MIC for voice coms would be cool but not essential :) 

IGN - SkyAU Add me or reply with IGN.

Looking forward to playing with anyone interested!

replies.body: Ill help you lvl up, I also wanna play with someone to help me lvl up so ill add you and maybe we can play

Sure, I can help. But make this clear: You don't need help LEVELING UP. My advice is play 3-4-5 games a day if you're busy just to get that win of a day. The win of the day gives you a lot of experience, and I climbed 19 lvls in a matter of about a month (due to the update). Would be happy to help you!
